TEXT.TITLE: DATAFLEX <DFLX> NAMES PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Dataflex Corp said it named Richard Rose president, succeeding Jeffrey Lamm, who continues as chairman and chief executive officer. Rose has been executive vice president of the desktop computer marketing company since joining it in 1984. Reuter
